onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: This is a nice study room that you got for us, Laura.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Thanks, unfortunately I couldn't get us the old room. Lots of people are doing study groups this term.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Well, either way, let's take a look at the homework that we have this week.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: So this is the first week's homework? There aren't any coding questions at all.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Well, it's only the first week. There's only two courses we have to deal with right now. We can't expect much.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Yeah, things will get more difficult in the future for sure. Just be thankful that we only have these to get started.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Yeah, that's true I supposed. Either way, let's show those slimes who's boss around here!

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Let's see how well they hold against my skills.
